Posts.Content: I said "Why not me?" It made it easier. It happens. No one dies of old age. Live each day well. Relationships that need to be repaired? Spiritual completeness that needs attention? Take the prolonging life treatments. It will give you time to get things right.... with the Lord and with those you love. It will pay eternal dividends! Love -- JL
Posts.Title: What Did i Do, to Get Cancer
